subject: Football
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: Representatives from the two N.F.L. teams dismissed an overture by the Rams owner E. Stanley Kroenke, who said he was willing to let a second team invest in his rival project.
snippet: Representatives from the two N.F.L. teams dismissed an overture by the Rams owner E. Stanley Kroenke, who said he was willing to let a second team invest in his rival project.
